p: The PSST questionnaire consists of 19 items in two sections: The first section contains 14 items of PMS symptoms, and the second section contains five items evaluating the effects of symptoms on women suffering from PMS. All the items were answered using a 4-point Likert scale (none, mild, average, and severe), which are assigned a score from 0 to 3 (0–1–2-3), respectively [ 34]. The content validity ratio and content validity index of this questionnaire were calculated to be 0.7 and 0.8, respectively. Moreover, the reliability of the scale was confirmed by a Cronbach’s alpha coefficient of 0.9 [ 35].
